text: Ac þis is ne þynceð no us well gesæd.

Forðy on ælcne timan mon ah to læranne & to tihtanne folc to bereowsunge, & to wirceanne ures drihtenes willan & allra swiðost folce is to reowsienne on ðissum ðrim dagum þonne hi gehyrað hu ure drihten hælend crist ðrowade for us.
Eac biscepas æt heora bisceopstole sæcgað larspel þonne hi lædaðin penitentes, & hi doðabsolutionem, & sume sæcgað spell of þære crismhalgunge & of þæm balsome.
And wite ge to gewissan butan ge andettan eowre synnan mid nane þinge ne mid gebedum ne mid ælmessan ne bið hit well gebett wið godd.
Sumes goodes mannes gesihðe be heofene rice & be helle wite ræd hit & well understond & þu bist þe betere.
Bysne be drymannum & be anum godan men macharius gehatæn.
Be ðam ðe men sceolan forgiuan swa swa hi wyllað þæt godd forgiue heom.
